text: @realDonaldTrump So are you all happy happy now that @NYGovCuomo praised you this morning? Got your pets and strokes, maybe a belly rub to your enormous ego to make sure your feelings aren't hurt. Mr. Cuomo thank you for keeping people informed with facts, clear language and no rambling. #Covid19
